posts.post_title: FS: T206 Southern Leaguers, all graded PSA 2 - 2.5
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
I currently have the following Southern Leaguers for sale:

T206 Carlton Molesworth, Piedmont, PSA 2 - $70
T206 Dolly Stark, Old Mill, PSA 2.5 - $85
T206 Juan Violat, Piedmont, PSA 2 - **SOLD**
T206 Charles Seitz, Old Mill, PSA 2 - **SOLD**

Prices include delivery.  Front and back scans are below.  Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you would like any.  Paypal fine with no additional surcharge (send paypal to aamoniz@yahoo.com).

Regards,
Adam
